name: Fury of the Pharaohs
description:
An online multiplayer third-person arena shooter. Play as a child of the recently deceased Pharaoh, aiming to eliminate their siblings to claim the title of Pharaoh for themself.

Feedback Form:

https://forms.office.com/r/kxzKnnNuWf

Controls:

WASD/Left stick to move.

Mouse/Right stick to aim.

Left Mouse/RT to shoot (hold to charge)

Left Shift/LT to sprint

ESC to lock/unlock mouse cursor
